name: dandyishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that someone, especially a man, is very interested in their own appearance and in dressing in expensive, fashionable clothes: My cousin was tall, dandyishly dressed, and loud. His elaborate behaviour was just a way of dandyishly showing off to his social circle.
More examplesFewer examplesThe star was handsome, eloquent, and dandyishly well dressed.He was well known for his elegant dress and dandyishly fancy walking sticks.He was very dandyishly dressed, yet he seemed less happy than his brightly coloured clothes might suggest.
